short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let you preview/download files from GitLab in the FASTEST way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We have a quick and handy solution, a browser extension which helps you view or download files from GitLab/Github very fast! (actually not only PDF files but also all file types)
